XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="SQLRUCube" displayName="SQLRU" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="Forum.Post" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="Posted" displayName="Дата поста" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Posted" allDisplayName="Posted" sourceExpression="$zdh($p(%source.Posted," "),3)" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Year" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" sort="asc" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Month" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Day" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level name="MonthNum" displayName="Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Tech" displayName="Технология" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Text" allDisplayName="Text" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceExpression="%cube.GetTech(%source.Text)" name="Theme" displayName="Технология" disabled="false" list="true" listDelimiter="," useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Author" displayName="Автор" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Author" allDisplayName="Author" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="AuthorExtId" name="AuthorExtId" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="Аноним" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property sourceProperty="Author" name="Author" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <listing name="New_listing1" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="Author,Posted,ExtId,Text,Topic->Name,Topic->Updated,Topic->Views"></listing> </cube>

Method.name: GetTech
Method.Implementation:
s text=$zconvert(text,"l") s res="" #define addtech(%tstr,%tech) if $F(text,%tstr) s $p(res,",",$I(i))=%tech w res,!
$$$addtech("cach","Cache") $$$addtech("ensemble","Ensemble") $$$addtech("iknow","iKnow") $$$addtech("deepsee","DeepSee") $$$addtech("gt.m","GT.M") if res="" s res="Другое" q res
